description.originalText:
Ben helped me after a bad fall which sent me to the hospital and then rehabilitation.  He was very respectful and kind.

I would definitely use him again.

description.displayText: Ben was very friendly and helpful with the care he provided. He took direction very well for specific needs and was eager to take on responsibility. He did a great job of communicating, as well. I absolutely recommend him and we hope to work with him again soon!
description.originalText: Ben was very friendly and helpful with the care he provided. He took direction very well for specific needs and was eager to take on responsibility. He did a great job of communicating, as well. I absolutely recommend him and we hope to work with him again soon!

description.displayText: Excellent!  Ben stayed overnight with my husband for two nights on short notice after C. suffered a bad fall when I was out of town.  Clearly Ben was very experienced with senior care, helping C. in and out of bed, changing linens, etc.  Good communicator, very warm and pleasant.  Thank you, Ben!
description.originalText: Excellent!  Ben stayed overnight with my husband for two nights on short notice after C. suffered a bad fall when I was out of town.  Clearly Ben was very experienced with senior care, helping C. in and out of bed, changing linens, etc.  Good communicator, very warm and pleasant.  Thank you, Ben!

description.displayText:
I hired Ben to assist in the care of my husband. We were so fortunate to have found Ben and able to hire him and have him help with my husband's care. 

He always came in with a huge smile, a great attitude, and did everything we asked plus so much more. Ben was well-trained and executed his job with wonderful expertise. 

His greatest gift to us was treating my husband as a "person" and as a "man."  My husband had a buddy to talk with and watch sports with and kid around with. Ben took care of my husband in every way, but the added care and friendship was priceless. 

Ben was truly God sent and I thank God everyday for sending him to us. You will be blessed if you begin as an employer and then grow to have a life long friend. 

If you have any questions, I've authorized Ben to provide my number on serious inquiries. It's just not something that I can post online.
